ygData.subject: Re: Doctrine of Wizardry
ygData.msgSnippet: The levitate spell enables you to walk over ground which can be unstable or harmful to our feeble bodies.  (Not sure, but I believe you would be harmed if thee
ygData.messageBody:
The levitate spell enables you to walk over ground which can be unstable or harmful to our feeble bodies. (Not sure, but I believe you would be harmed if thee walked over Lava)

Valacian - 24th Level Erudite Wizard, Xegony

-----Original Message-----
From: Robin McCaig [SMTP:twister@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 3:15 PM
To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_spell_research] Doctrine of Wizardry

From: "Robin McCaig" <twister@...>

You are right, Flight is listed in the doctrine of wizardry.
We need a high level mage to get the two runes needed expulsion and
attraction, i believe, and see what the result is.

What good does the spell levitate do? If all it does is make you rise up a
little it wont help you in battle or nothing.
Thanks
Twisterkahn
Tarew Marr
LLTS!
